extendedInfo.description: e-Book for Malaysia Rules of Court 2012.Disclaimer:-This e-Book is for general reference only and not necessarily comprehensive. Obtain legal advice as and when appropriate. We shall not be held liable for any error or omission from this material.How to use:-1. Flip the screen from left to right or vice versa to flip the pages.2. Tap once on the screen to remove any overlay functions. Tap once again to retrieve the functions.3. Use Bookmark to save any favorite pages for quick future reference.4. Use Search function for quick search.5. Use fingers to enlarge or reduce the text.6. Scroll the pages at the bottom for quick scrolling.Now you do not need to carry heavy books to court and it's for your easy reading at coffee house too.How much....nahhhhh it's free. But donation is welcome. Enjoy it!!!keywords:-Malaysia, law, rules, regulations, legislation, lawyer, court, legal, attorney, law book, eBook, law eBook, law Malaysia, Malaysia court, court rules, e-book, Malaysia law, books law, law journal, rules of court, federal law, law firm, statutes, case, mahkamah
